actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to clause 13 of Rule 1. The next meeting is scheduled for 11:00 a.m. on April 3, 2025.

actions-list.header: ADJUSTMENT OF THE WHOLE NUMBER OF THE HOUSE
actions-list.actionItem: Under clause 5(d) of Rule XX, the Chair announced to the House that, in light of the administration of the Oath of Office to the gentleman from Florida, Mr. Patronis, and the gentleman from Florida, Mr. Fine, the whole number of the House is 433.

Representatives-Elect Randy Fine, Sixth District, State of Florida, and Jimmy Patronis, First District, State of Florida, presented themselves in the well of the House for the purpose of taking the Oath of Office which was administered by the Speaker of the House.

The House received a message from the Clerk. The Clerk transmitted to the House a copy of a letter received from Ms. Maria Matthews, Esquire, Director of Elections, with the Florida Department of State indicating that, according to the unofficial results for the Special General Election held on April 1, 2025, the Honorable Randy Fine was elected Representative to Congress for the Sixth Congressional District of Florida.

The House received a message from the Clerk. The Clerk transmitted to the House a copy of a letter received from Ms. Maria Matthews, Esquire, Director of Elections, with the Florida Department of State indicating that, according to the unofficial results for the Special General Election held on April 1, 2025, the Honorable Jimmy Patronis was elected Representative to Congress for the First Congressional District of Florida.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to clause 13 of Rule 1, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
